this_title: Kontakthof mit Damen und Herren ab 65
introduction: Kontakthof is a place where people meet who are searching for contact. To show yourself, to deny yourself. With fears. Desire. Disappointments. Desperation. First experiences. First attempts. Tenderness and what arises from it was an important theme in the work. Another, for example, was circus. Showing part of yourself, to overcome oneself.注：该条目为148分钟全长演出片段，https://movie.douban.com/subject/4899886/为幕后纪录片。
foreign_title: Kontakthof mit Damen und Herren ab 65
